Reviews.Title: “Very poor service.”
Reviews.Author: Andy123423
Reviews.Content: booked stay hotel lastminutecom october 2010 attending function mayfair running tight time arrived main hotel door locked note saying 5 minutes receptionist eventually inform twin booked paid filled twin available luckily single available kept 20 minutes whilst tried sort booking stressed late function apology offered refund cheaper lastminutes fault true single lumpy bed weak shower sounded hair dryer probably money hotel eventually offer 25 discount future stay taking offer
